docs.text:
Merlin.jl


Merlin
 is a deep learning framework written in 
Julia
. It aims to provide a fast, flexible and compact deep learning library for machine learning.


See README.md for basic usage.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Merlin  is a deep learning framework written in  Julia . It aims to provide a fast, flexible and compact deep learning library for machine learning.  See README.md for basic usage.
docs.title: Merlin.jl

docs.text:
Functors


Functor
 is an abstract type of function object. Every 
Functor
 implements forward and backward computation. The following are concrete types of 
Functor
s.


#


Merlin.relu
 
 
Method
.


Compute activation function. The supported functions are:




relu(x)
: rectifier linear unit


sigmoid(x)


tanh(x)




👉 Example


x
 
=
 
Var
(
rand
(
Float32
,
10
,
5
))


y
 
=
 
relu
(
x
)






source

docs.text: Functor  is an abstract type of function object. Every  Functor  implements forward and backward computation. The following are concrete types of  Functor s.  #  Merlin.relu     Method .  Compute activation function. The supported functions are:   relu(x) : rectifier linear unit  sigmoid(x)  tanh(x)   👉 Example  x   =   Var ( rand ( Float32 , 10 , 5 ))  y   =   relu ( x )   source
